item.title: Trump Slams Charlamagne tha God for Fox News Interview Claiming a “Political Coup” in the Republican Party Is “Going on Right Now”
item.description: “He’s a Low IQ individual, has no idea what words are coming out of his mouth and knows nothing about me or what I have done,” the president wrote on Truth Social.

item.title: Ghislaine Maxwell Moved to Lower-Security Texas Prison Where She’ll Be Housed With Two Famous Inmates
item.description: Jeffrey Epstein’s right-hand woman, incarcerated for 20 years and teeming with knowledge about the late financier, met with a Department of Justice liaison in Florida.

item.title: Trump Cites Rupert Murdoch’s Age in Bid to Depose Him Right Away in WSJ Lawsuit
item.description: President Trump asked a court Monday to order an expedited deposition of Rupert Murdoch in his suit against the Wall Street Journal, citing the mogul’s advanced age. Trump sued Murdoch on July 1

item.title: Colbert Teases Trump After Name Reportedly Listed in Epstein Files: “Mystery Man Known Only as Micropenis DJT”
item.description: A new report from the Wall Street Journal alleges that Attorney General Pam Bondi told Trump his name was mentioned in Jeffrey Epstein’s sex-trafficking investigation files.

item.title: Did Jeffrey Epstein Pay Steve Bannon for His Infamous, Never-Seen Tapes? (Exclusive)
item.description: He says it’s a documentary. But the 15 hours of footage Bannon shot with Epstein were reportedly training for a ‘60 Minutes’-style redemption tour that never happened.
